entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6Â°C

Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 2:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
